creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: jar with wide shoulders tapering down to a flat base; short neck set with an everted rim covered inside with a pale yellow glaze and on the exterior with 'washes' of deep blue cobalt glaze, stopping short of the foot and splashing some of the unglazed area; cover with a wide flat knob
markings: dealer\'s and packer\'s stickers, on bottom
title: Covered Jar
